author: andrzejnovak
body:
Working alternative to 
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24918
at the cost of duplicating JetTagsProducers. 

Tested against previously problematic matrix config
https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/pull-request-integration/PR-24918/31360/runTheMatrix-results/9.0_Higgs200ChargedTaus+Higgs200ChargedTaus+DIGI+RECO+HARVEST/cmdLog
title: Alternative for #24918 DeepDoubleCvL and DeepDoubleCvB tagger integration
